meanings.definition: Relating to the development of organs.
meanings.sent1: The organogenetic changes in the body were crucial for growth.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the organogenetic process in simple terms.
meanings.sent3: The organogenetic growth of the plant surprised the gardener.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to learning was organogenetic, shaping her future success.
meanings.sent5: The organogenetic nature of the project made it challenging but rewarding.

meanings.definition: The process of organ formation in an organism.
meanings.sent1: Understanding organogenetic development is important in biology.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the organogenetic stages of the embryo.
meanings.sent3: The organogenetic changes in the tadpole fascinated the students.
meanings.sent4: The hospital's focus was on the organogenetic health of patients.
meanings.sent5: The organogenetic complexity of the human body is astounding.
